dmca.title: FW: Copyright Violation
dmca.body:
NC


-----Original Message-----
From: Cory Wagner [mailto:coryw@investopedia.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, February 01, 2005 2:07 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Copyright Violation
Importance: High

ThePlanet.com Internet Services Legal Department,

It has been brought to our attention that virtually ALL of the content
posted on http://www.pain-gain.com/ (a site hosted by ThePlanet.com) has
been blatantly copied from our site, Investopedia.com:

We take plagiarism very seriously; as I'm sure you do as well.  We believe
your violation of our copyright was and is willful and as such, pursuant to
the United States Copyright Act, liability could reach $150,000.

THIS IS YOUR FIRST AND FINAL NOTICE. Remove all plagiarized content
immediately in the next 5 business days.

Thanks for your time,

Cory Wagner (Co-Founder)
coryw@investopedia.com
ph: 780-421-0555 ext.101
fx: 780-421-0455
http://www.investopedia.com
